paramSchema.title: Name
paramSchema.name: name
paramSchema.description: A name to identify the Kafka instance.

paramSchema.title: Host
paramSchema.name: host
paramSchema.description: The host of Kafka JMX endpoint

paramSchema.title: Port
paramSchema.name: port
paramSchema.description: The port of Kafka JMX endpoint

paramSchema.title: User
paramSchema.name: user
paramSchema.description: The user of Cassandra JMX endpoint

paramSchema.title: Password
paramSchema.name: password
paramSchema.description: The password of Kafka JMX endpoint

paramSchema.title: Poll Interval (ms)
paramSchema.name: pollInterval
paramSchema.description: How often (in milliseconds) to poll for metrics.

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The Source to display in the legend for the metrics data.  It will default to the hostname of the server
